short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy way to share ponies across Pony Town!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy way to share ponies across Pony Town! thanks to this plugin you can simply copy your pony's data and share it with a friend, or the whole town! and they can use the data to save your pony design on their account, using only copy and paste!
